definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: Shakespeare' s sonnets are the only direct expression of the poet' s own feelings.
sentences.chinese: 这些十四行诗都是莎翁直抒胸臆的成果。

sentences.english: Shakespear wrote a lot of sonnets.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚写了许多十四行诗。

sentences.english: Sonnets were a stylised way of demonstrating your technical skill.
sentences.chinese: 十四行诗在当时是展示个人技巧的流行方法。

sentences.english: The composer set a sonnet to music.
sentences.chinese: 作曲家为一首十四行诗谱了曲。

sentences.english: He rhymed out sonnets in her praise.
sentences.chinese: 他写成押韵的十四行诗歌颂她。

sentences.english: The lines have distinctly a sonnet rhyme-scheme, but look closely.
sentences.chinese: 这14行明显使用了十四行诗的押韵规则，但仔细看。

sentences.english: It is a sonnet, too. It's a sort of song of a worker.
sentences.chinese: 也是一首十四行诗，是一个劳动者内心的歌。

sentences.english: Flamand returns to sing the sonnet he has just composed.
sentences.chinese: 不久弗莱米德返回，诵唱他刚刚完成作曲的十四行诗。

sentences.english: You will have sonnets and little bits of prose.
sentences.chinese: 包括十四行诗和少量的散文。

sentences.english: Jack was delivered of a sonnet on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 杰克就这个题目作了一首十四行诗。

sentences.english: Is a sonnet chanted by glistening waves.
sentences.chinese: 是波光影调吟诵的十四行诗。

sentences.english: He fell hard for Eric, writing sonnets to him.
sentences.chinese: 鲁迪为他创作了一首十四行诗。

sentences.english: He's making exactly the same disclaimer that he had made in Sonnet Seven.
sentences.chinese: 他发表了和他的十四行诗第七首中同样的免责声明。

sentences.english: For two weeks he worked hard at the sonnets.
sentences.chinese: 他费了二周认真研究十四行诗。

sentences.english: William Shakespeare' s sonnets comprise two trinities of truth, goodness and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亚十四行诗集包含了两个真善美的结合体。

sentences.english: Shakespeare's sonnets are the only direct expression_r of the poet's own feelings.
sentences.chinese: 这些十四行诗都是莎翁直抒胸臆的成果。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
Alexandr Sergeevich Pushkin (1799-1837), great Russian romantic poet

Shakespeare/slang or popular culture abbr. of 莎士比亞|莎士比亚[Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4]
Giovanni Boccaccio (1313-1375), Italian writer, poet, and humanist, author of Decameron 十日談|十日谈[Shi2 ri4 Tan2]
a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
Shelley/abbr. for 珀西·比希·雪萊|珀西·比希·雪莱[Po4 xi1 · Bi3 xi1 · Xue3 lai2]
